title: Terrible FPS on all settings - GTX970
body:
Hi.

I don't really understand what's going on - I drop to around 40-50 FPS randomly with the following build:

i5-4690K 3.50ghz
GTX GeForce 970
16GB Ram
Windows 8.1

FPS was pretty decent till a couple of patches ago - not sure if it's my drivers/I've fucked up a setting or something
Any suggestions would be great

replies.body:
This is a known issue, and Riot aren't working on it.

http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv3/peachy-chan-/sadpanda.png

Sorry I don't have a fix for you.
At the moment I'm getting sort of the same problem,
my screen goes weird / I can view other players movements (so... not internet?) but my character is stuck on one spot running. 
I'm assuming it could be FPS problem, it sits over 100 then jumps down to 5 and back up. I'm assuming it could be patching so right now I am

1.  Updating all graphics drivers.
2.  Repairing LoL client. 
3.  Restarting PC.

Will get back to you if any of it works.
